name: Daily Treasure Hunter
info: Seek out hidden treasures and valuable artifacts. Follow ancient maps to discover buried riches. Brave dangerous guardians to claim your rewards. Resets daily at midnight.
dialogs: Ah, a fellow seeker of fortune!
I have maps to treasures hidden across the realm.
Today's map leads to an ancient burial site.
The treasure is guarded by magical wards and traps.
Many have sought this treasure, none have returned.
Success will bring riches beyond your wildest dreams.
Are you brave enough to claim today's treasure?
accept: I'm ready to brave any danger for hidden treasures.
decline: I don't have the equipment for treasure hunting.
